p: Tighter market regulation, which has already been introduced in 2017, will favour this situation. The introduction of the “Pharmacy for the Pharmacist” Act has significantly reduced the creation of new pharmacies, increasing the prestige of the pharmacist profession. This situation is particularly important taking into account the enormous role of the pharmacist in population health protection, which is particularly noticeable during the COVID-19 pandemic. Detailed legal regulations may result in the more effective functioning of the whole health care system. Further stabilization of the pharmacy market in Poland is expected in the next years.
